channel.title: Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping Activations
channel.description: This feed contains latest Copernicus EMS - Rapid Mapping activations.
channel.generator: Copernicus EMS - Mapping Portal using Drupal

item.title: [EMSR543] Fire in La Palma, Canary Islands, Spain
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-17 19:45:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-17 23:09:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Spain;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

On 17/08/2021, a major fire started on the island of La Palma (Canary Islands). This fire is affecting mainly the El Paso municipality on the west of the island and the rural zone near a biodiverse National Park. Due to adverse weather conditions, the fire could last several days and affect populated areas. Copernicus EMS is requested to provide Delineation and Grading products.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR543] Fire in La Palma, Canary Islands, Spain
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR543/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):
item.iwgsem:activationName: Copernicus EMS: [EMSR543] Fire in La Palma, Canary Islands, Spain
item.iwgsem:activationDescription: On 17/08/2021, a major fire started on the island of La Palma (Canary Islands). This fire is affecting mainly the El Paso municipality on the west of the island and the rural zone near a biodiverse National Park. Due to adverse weather conditions, the fire could last several days and affect populated areas. Copernicus EMS is requested to provide Delineation and Grading products.

item.title: [EMSR542] Forest fire in Lavrio, Eastern Attica, Greece
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-16 07:26:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-17 07:43:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Greece;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

A wildfire has been raging from Monday noon (17/08/2021) at Lavrio, in Eastern Attica, Greece, burning forests, rural and urban areas. The strong wind and high flammability of forest fuels due to prolonged drought, make the work of firefighters very difficult. The residential communities of Agios Konstantinos, Synterina and Markati have been evacuated for precautionary reasons. Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping is asked to provide First Estimate, Delineation and Grading Products.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR542] Forest fire in Lavrio, Eastern Attica, Greece
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR542/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):
item.iwgsem:activationName: Copernicus EMS: [EMSR542] Forest fire in Lavrio, Eastern Attica, Greece
item.iwgsem:activationDescription: A wildfire has been raging from Monday noon (17/08/2021) at Lavrio, in Eastern Attica, Greece, burning forests, rural and urban areas. The strong wind and high flammability of forest fuels due to prolonged drought, make the work of firefighters very difficult. The residential communities of Agios Konstantinos, Synterina and Markati have been evacuated for precautionary reasons. Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping is asked to provide First Estimate, Delineation and Grading Products.

item.title: [EMSR541] Fire in Var, France
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-16 19:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-17 07:26:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: France;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

A forest fire which burned more than 4000 ha of forest and scrubland continues to evolve in the VAR department, in the south of France. The fire is fed by a strong mistral and cause the caulking of many people.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR541] Fire in Var, France
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR541/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):
item.iwgsem:activationName: Copernicus EMS: [EMSR541] Fire in Var, France
item.iwgsem:activationDescription: A forest fire which burned more than 4000 ha of forest and scrubland continues to evolve in the VAR department, in the south of France. The fire is fed by a strong mistral and cause the caulking of many people.

item.title: [EMSR540] Fire in Western Attica, Greece
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-16 09:29:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-17 07:03:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Greece;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

A wildfire is raging from Monday noon in the west sector of Attica region at Pateras mountain, burning down large forests rural and urban areas. The moderate wind and high flammability of forest fuels due to prolonged draught, make the work of firefighters very difficult. The residential communities of Mikro or Mega Bathyhori, Agios Georgios, Agia Paraskeyi, Kryo Pigadi, Palaiohori and Beniza have been evacuated for precautionary reasons. According to Fire Service 330 firefighters with 115 vehicles are currently operating in the area, assisted by eight (8) ground force group, including forces deployed by the European Civil Protection Mechanism, 143 firefighters from Poland with 46 vehicles, six (6) helicopters and five (5) planes including Beriev-200. The Defkalion Plan was activated and the Greek Army assisted by 5 ground force group.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR540] Fire in Western Attica, Greece
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR540/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):
item.iwgsem:activationName: Copernicus EMS: [EMSR540] Fire in Western Attica, Greece
item.iwgsem:activationDescription: A wildfire is raging from Monday noon in the west sector of Attica region at Pateras mountain, burning down large forests rural and urban areas. The moderate wind and high flammability of forest fuels due to prolonged draught, make the work of firefighters very difficult. The residential communities of Mikro or Mega Bathyhori, Agios Georgios, Agia Paraskeyi, Kryo Pigadi, Palaiohori and Beniza have been evacuated for precautionary reasons. According to Fire Service 330 firefighters with 115 vehicles are currently operating in the area, assisted by eight (8) ground force group, including forces deployed by the European Civil Protection Mechanism, 143 firefighters from Poland with 46 vehicles, six (6) helicopters and five (5) planes including Beriev-200. The Defkalion Plan was activated and the Greek Army assisted by 5 ground force group.

item.title: [EMSR539] Fire in Algarve, Portugal
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-14 23:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-16 21:01:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Portugal;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

Since 15/08/2021, a forest fire is spreading in a large forest and shrub area of the municipalities of Castro Marim and Tavira in Faro District – Algarve. Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping is requested to provide First Estimate Product, Delineation and Grading products.

item.title: [EMSR538] Fire in Castilla y Leon, Spain
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-14 08:44:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-16 11:13:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Spain;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

On 14/08/2021, a major forest fire started close to a road located in Cepeda de La Mora(Ávila). This fire mainly affects the municipality of Robledillo, Villaviciosa, Riofrio, Sotalbo and Solosancho in Castilla y León. Due to the adverse weather conditions, the fire could be active for several days and affect more areas. Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping is requested to provide First Estimate Product,
Delineation and Grading products.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR538] Fire in Castilla y Leon, Spain
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR538/aemfeed

item.title: [EMSR537] Fire in Valencia province, Spain
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-14 20:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-16 11:11:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Spain;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

On 14/08/2021, a major forest fire started in Azuébar (Castellón), located in Sierra de Espadán Natural Park.
The residents of the municipality have been evacuated for precautionary reasons.
Due to the adverse weather conditions, next hours will be crucial.
Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping is requested to provide First Estimate Product, Delineation and Grading products.

item.title: [EMSR536] Earthquake in Haiti
item.description:
Type of Event: Earthquake (Ground shaking);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-14 12:29:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-14 16:08:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Haiti;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

A strong earthquake of 7.2 M hit the South of Haiti on 14th August 2021 at 12:29 UTC. The epicenter of the quake was about 12 km Northeast of Saint-Louis-Du-Sud, at a depth of 10 km. According to the media, at least 300 people were killed and 1800 injured.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR536] Earthquake in Haiti
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR536/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):
item.iwgsem:activationName: Copernicus EMS: [EMSR536] Earthquake in Haiti
item.iwgsem:activationDescription: A strong earthquake of 7.2 M hit the South of Haiti on 14th August 2021 at 12:29 UTC. The epicenter of the quake was about 12 km Northeast of Saint-Louis-Du-Sud, at a depth of 10 km. According to the media, at least 300 people were killed and 1800 injured.

item.title: [EMSR535] Wildfires in Albania
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-10 00:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-11 23:23:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Albania;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

Since mid-July 2021, Albania has been affected by wildfires, throughout several parts of its territory. Hundreds of hectares of forests, pastures and thousands of olive trees have been destroyed especially in the Vlora and Fier regions. The Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping Service has been requested to provide delineation mapping and monitoring.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR535] Wildfires in Albania
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR535/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):
item.iwgsem:activationName: Copernicus EMS: [EMSR535] Wildfires in Albania
item.iwgsem:activationDescription: Since mid-July 2021, Albania has been affected by wildfires, throughout several parts of its territory. Hundreds of hectares of forests, pastures and thousands of olive trees have been destroyed especially in the Vlora and Fier regions. The Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping Service has been requested to provide delineation mapping and monitoring.

item.title: [EMSR534] Fire in Calabria, Italy
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-08 10:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-11 20:46:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Italy;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

A dangerous situation persists in Calabria, South Italy, due to several fires that are affecting the
territory. The flames have restarted in the Aspromonte Mountain around the San Luca Valley,
where there are the Unesco heritage beech trees called Faggete Vetuste. Ground teams from other italian regions have been deployed to the affected places, as well several Canadairs and helicopters.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR534] Fire in Calabria, Italy
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR534/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):
item.iwgsem:activationName: Copernicus EMS: [EMSR534] Fire in Calabria, Italy
item.iwgsem:activationDescription:
A dangerous situation persists in Calabria, South Italy, due to several fires that are affecting the
territory. The flames have restarted in the Aspromonte Mountain around the San Luca Valley,
where there are the Unesco heritage beech trees called Faggete Vetuste. Ground teams from other italian regions have been deployed to the affected places, as well several Canadairs and helicopters.

item.title: [EMSR533] Algeria Forest Fires
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-11 10:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-11 11:20:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Algeria;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

Since 9 August, several forest fires are affecting the north-east of Algeria. The most affected areas are the regions of Tizi Ouzou and Bejaia around 100km east of the capital Algiers. Following media reports, several houses are destroyed and at least 42 people have been killed.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR533] Algeria Forest Fires
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR533/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):
item.iwgsem:activationName: Copernicus EMS: [EMSR533] Algeria Forest Fires
item.iwgsem:activationDescription: Since 9 August, several forest fires are affecting the north-east of Algeria. The most affected areas are the regions of Tizi Ouzou and Bejaia around 100km east of the capital Algiers. Following media reports, several houses are destroyed and at least 42 people have been killed.

item.title: [EMSR532] Wildfire in Diabolitsi, Greece
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-04 16:44:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-06 08:32:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Greece;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

Α wildfire is raging from Wednesday in Diabolitsi Municipality at Western Greece Region, burning down large forests of pine and rural areas. The fire is still active on several fonts. The moderate wind, high temperatures and high flammability of forest fuels, make the work of firefighters very difficult. The areas, Diabolitsi, Ano Melpeia and Kato Melpeia have been ordered to evacuate for precautionary reasons after a fire broke out. According to Fire Service 36 firefighters with 24 vehicles are currently operating in the area, assisted by 18 ground force firefighters, thirteen helicopters and eight planes.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR532] Wildfire in Diabolitsi, Greece
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR532/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):
item.iwgsem:activationName: Copernicus EMS: [EMSR532] Wildfire in Diabolitsi, Greece
item.iwgsem:activationDescription: Α wildfire is raging from Wednesday in Diabolitsi Municipality at Western Greece Region, burning down large forests of pine and rural areas. The fire is still active on several fonts. The moderate wind, high temperatures and high flammability of forest fuels, make the work of firefighters very difficult. The areas, Diabolitsi, Ano Melpeia and Kato Melpeia have been ordered to evacuate for precautionary reasons after a fire broke out. According to Fire Service 36 firefighters with 24 vehicles are currently operating in the area, assisted by 18 ground force firefighters, thirteen helicopters and eight planes.

item.title: [EMSR531] Wildfire in East Mani, Greece
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-03 13:23:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-06 08:24:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Greece;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

Α wildfire is raging from Thursday in East Mani Municipality at Peloponnese Region, burning down large forests of pine and rural areas. The fire is still active on several fronts. The moderate wind, high temperatures and high flammability of forest fuels, make the work of firefighters very difficult. Several villages have been ordered to evacuate for precautionary reasons after a fire broke out. According to Fire Service 88 firefighters with 25 vehicles are currently operating in the area, assisted by 3 ground force group, one helicopter and two planes.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR531] Wildfire in East Mani, Greece
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR531/aemfeed

Several villages have been ordered to evacuate for precautionary reasons after a fire broke out. According to Fire Service 88 firefighters with 25 vehicles are currently operating in the area, assisted by 3 ground force group, one helicopter and two planes.

item.title: [EMSR530] Wildfire in Fokida, Greece
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-05 12:19:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-06 08:21:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Greece;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

A wildfire is raging from Thursday noon in Central Greece, burning down large forest and rural areas. The moderate wind and high flammability of forest fuels due to prolonged draught, make the work of firefighters very difficult. Elaia and Kallithea villages have been evacuated for precautionary reasons. According to Fire Service 28 firefighters with 10 vehicles are currently operating in the area, assisted by 1 ground force group.

item.title: [EMSR529] Wildfires in North Macedonia
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-05 14:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-05 15:59:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: North Macedonia;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

Wildfires caused by extremely hot weather are raging in parts of North Macedonia, as well as in other countries in Southeast Europe. Firefighters and emergency services are operating in the affected areas in order to contain the fires.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR529] Wildfires in North Macedonia
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR529/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):

item.iwgsem:activationDescription: Wildfires caused by extremely hot weather are raging in parts of North Macedonia, as well as in other countries in Southeast Europe. Firefighters and emergency services are operating in the affected areas in order to contain the fires.

item.title: [EMSR528] Forest fire in Ancient Olympia Municipality, Western Greece Region, Greece
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-04 10:03:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-05 11:38:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Greece;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

Α wildfire is raging since 4 July 2021 in Ancient Olympia Municipality at Western Greece Region, burning down large forests of pine and rural areas. The fire is active on several fonts. The moderate wind, high temperatures and high flammability of forest fuels make the work of firefighters very difficult. The areas of Ancient Olympia, Pelopio, Platanio, Koskina, Mageiras, Kladeo, Xelidoni, Kaykonia have been ordered to evacuate for precautionary reasons. In the area 174 firefighters with 52 vehicles, assisted by 9 ground force groups, four (4) helicopters and two (2) planes has been deployed. Voluntary firefighters, water tankers and local government machinery provide assistance.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR528] Forest fire in Ancient Olympia Municipality, Western Greece Region, Greece
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR528/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):

The areas of Ancient Olympia, Pelopio, Platanio, Koskina, Mageiras, Kladeo, Xelidoni, Kaykonia have been ordered to evacuate for precautionary reasons. In the area 174 firefighters with 52 vehicles, assisted by 9 ground force groups, four (4) helicopters and two (2) planes has been deployed. item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-03 13:22:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-04 08:22:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Greece;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

From Tuesday afternoon wildfires are raging the island of Evia and the north sector of Attica region in Greece, burning down large forests, urban interfaces and rural areas. The moderate wind, high temperatures and high flammability of forest, make the work of firefighters very difficult. Several firefighters with numerous vehicles are currently operating in the affected areas.

item.title: [EMSR526] Fire in Rhodes island, North Aegean District, Greece
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-08-01 15:38:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-02 13:42:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Greece;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

A wildfire is raging from Sunday 1 August noon in the island of Rhodes, burning down large forest and rural areas.
The moderate wind and high flammability of forest fuels due to prolonged draught, make the work of firefighters very difficult. Psinthos village has been evacuated for precautionary reasons.
According to the Greek Fire Service, 103 firefighters with 20 vehicles were operating in the area on Sunday 2 August,
assisted by 6 ground force group, six (6) helicopters and three (3) planes. Another resources are planned to be deployed.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR526] Fire in Rhodes island, North Aegean District, Greece
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR526/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):

A wildfire is raging from Sunday 1 August noon in the island of Rhodes, burning down large forest and rural areas.
The moderate wind and high flammability of forest fuels due to prolonged draught, make the work of firefighters very difficult. Psinthos village has been evacuated for precautionary reasons.
According to the Greek Fire Service, 103 firefighters with 20 vehicles were operating in the area on Sunday 2 August,
assisted by 6 ground force group, six (6) helicopters and three (3) planes. Another resources are planned to be deployed.

item.title: [EMSR525] Fire in Aigialeia Municipality, Western Greece
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-07-31 12:38:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-08-01 10:55:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Greece;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

A wildfire is raging from Saturday July 31 noon in Aigialeia Municipality at Western Greece District , burning
down large forest, rural and urban areas. The strong winds and high temperatures make the work
of firefighters extremely difficult. Logos, Kamares, Lampiri and Ziria villages and a camping with children have been evacuated for precautionary reasons.
According to Fire Service 294 firefighters with 77 vehicles are currently operating in the area, assisted by 7 ground force groups, 7 helicopters and 5 planes.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR525] Fire in Aigialeia Municipality, Western Greece
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR525/aemfeed

of firefighters extremely difficult. Logos, Kamares, Lampiri and Ziria villages and a camping with children have been evacuated for precautionary reasons.
According to Fire Service 294 firefighters with 77 vehicles are currently operating in the area, assisted by 7 ground force groups, 7 helicopters and 5 planes.

item.title: [EMSR524] Forest and bog fire in Latvia
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Land fire: brush, bush, pasture);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-07-26 06:13:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-07-27 10:40:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Latvia;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

Due to the extreme weather conditions (heat and drought), on 26 July 2021 the forest and bog wildfire broke out in the nature conservation and specially protected area, in the Sigulda municipality, Ledurga parish. The cause of wildfire is unclear as it is scattered in separate locations. The combination of different circumstances, such as hard-to-access conditions, shortage of open-water sources and radio communication troubles in rural area, the situation may worsen



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR524] Forest and bog fire in Latvia
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR524/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):

The cause of wildfire is unclear as it is scattered in separate locations. The combination of different circumstances, such as hard-to-access conditions, shortage of open-water sources and radio communication troubles in rural area, the situation may worsen

item.title: [EMSR523] Fire in Sardegna region, Italy
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-07-24 10:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-07-26 11:13:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Italy;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

During the morning of July 24, the area near the town of Bonarcado in the province of Oristano, in Sardinia, was affected by large fires that spread very quickly due to several factors including strong southerly winds, high temperatures and vegetation prone to fire. The fires affected farms, crops and houses and led to the evacuation of 800 people. Several ground firefighting teams and regional resources supported by national and regional air resources were deployed. The fires are still affecting large areas involving brush forests, wildlands and urban interface areas. The Italian government has also activated the European Union Civil Protection Mechanism in support of the national resources. France deployed 2 Canadair aircraft from the European Civil Protection Pool (ECPP) and the Emergency Response Coordination Centre (ERCC) mobilised 2 additional Canadair aircraft from the rescEU reserve hosted by Greece.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR523] Fire in Sardegna region, Italy
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR523/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):

The fires affected farms, crops and houses and led to the evacuation of 800 people. Several ground firefighting teams and regional resources supported by national and regional air resources were deployed. The fires are still affecting large areas involving brush forests, wildlands and urban interface areas. The Italian government has also activated the European Union Civil Protection Mechanism in support of the national resources. France deployed 2 Canadair aircraft from the European Civil Protection Pool (ECPP) and the Emergency Response Coordination Centre (ERCC) mobilised 2 additional Canadair aircraft from the rescEU reserve hosted by Greece.

item.title: [EMSR522] Fires in Castilla La Mancha, Spain
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-07-24 14:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-07-25 12:15:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Spain;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

On 07/24/2021, a major forest fire started on a pine forest located in Liétor (Albacete), near theTalave reservoir. This fire mainly affects the municipality of Liétor, Isso and Hellín in Castilla La Mancha . Due to the adverse weather conditions the fire can be active for several days and affect populated areas. Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping is requested to provide First Estimate Product, Delineation and Grading products.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR522] Fires in Castilla La Mancha, Spain
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR522/aemfeed

item.title: [EMSR521] Fire in Samos Island, Greece
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-07-15 13:42:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-07-16 07:57:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Greece;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

A wildfire has raged from Thursday noon (15/07/2021) in the island of Samos, Greece, burning large areas of forest and rural areas. Fuel type and steep relief make the work of firefighters extremely difficult. Kokkari village and two hotels have been evacuated for precautionary reasons. A considerable firefighting effort is ongoing (16/07/2021). Copernicus EMS Mapping products will be used mainly by the fire service during firefighting operations and by local authorities (Forest Service, Regions of North Aegean, Municipalities) for recovery and restoration planning of the affected area. Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping is requested to provide First Estimate, Delineation and Grading products.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR521] Fire in Samos Island, Greece
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR521/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):

item.title: [EMSR520] Flood in Netherlands
item.description:
Type of Event: Flood (Riverine flood);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-07-16 09:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-07-15 23:57:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Netherlands;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

On 15 July, heavy rainfall caused historic flooding along parts of the River Meuse in the Netherlands. The Landelijk Operationeel Coördinatiecentrum (LOCC) triggered the Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping Service to monitor the flood evolution over the affected areas.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR520] Flood in Netherlands
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR520/aemfeed

item.title: [EMSR519] Flood in Switzerland
item.description:
Type of Event: Flood (Riverine flood);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-07-15 22:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-07-15 19:02:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Switzerland;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

Long-lasting and heavy rainfall led to a flood risk in most of Switzerland which is expected to
reach its peak between July 16 noon and 17 noon 2021 with long lasting high discharge rates in water bodies.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR519] Flood in Switzerland
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR519/aemfeed

item.title: [EMSR518] Flood in Belgium
item.description:
Type of Event: Flood (Riverine flood);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-07-14 20:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-07-14 14:00:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Belgium, Netherlands;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

Heavy rain affected the Walloon Region in Belgium, where a severe flood event is expected in the Eastern parts over the next days. The National Crisis Center triggered the Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping Service to monitor the flood evolution over the affected areas.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR518] Flood in Belgium

item.description:
Type of Event: Flood (Riverine flood);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-07-13 16:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-07-13 17:11:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Germany;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

Heavy rains affected Rhineland-Palatinate area where a severe flood event is expected over the next few days along the river Moselle. The German Joint Information and Situation Centre (GMLZ) triggered the Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping Service to monitor the flood evolution.



Details, maps:

item.title: [EMSR516] Wildfire in Kephalonia, Greece
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-07-03 11:13:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-07-05 06:49:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Greece;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

A big wildfire is raging from 3rd July morning in the island of Kephalonia. Large forests and rural areas were burnt down and several villages as Keparandriti, Agia Eirini, Markopoulo, Kremmidi, Pasta and Kolaitiwere were evacuated. According to Fire Service, 116 firefighters with 32 vehicles are operating in the area, with the assistance of ground forces and helicopters, even though the strong wind made firefighters' work extremely difficult. It was declared by the head of Fire Brigades that nobody was injured or harmed. On the 4th July, the situation was better as winds have weakend. The Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping Service products will be used by fire service during firefighting operations and by local authorities for recovery and restoration planning of the affected area.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR516] Wildfire in Kephalonia, Greece
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR516/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):

Large forests and rural areas were burnt down and several villages as Keparandriti, Agia Eirini, Markopoulo, Kremmidi, Pasta and Kolaitiwere were evacuated. According to Fire Service, 116 firefighters with 32 vehicles are operating in the area, with the assistance of ground forces and helicopters, even though the strong wind made firefighters' work extremely difficult. It was declared by the head of Fire Brigades that nobody was injured or harmed. On the 4th July, the situation was better as winds have weakend. The Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping Service products will be used by fire service during firefighting operations and by local authorities for recovery and restoration planning of the affected area.

item.title: [EMSR515] Fire in Cyprus
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-07-03 12:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-07-03 19:17:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Cyprus;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

On the afternoon of 3 July, a fire broke out in the Limassol district. Houses were destroyed and large areas of pine forest and other vegetation were burned in just a few hours. The Arakapas village has been evacuated as well as the district boundaries into Larnaca, Melini, Ora, Odou, Sykopetra, and Eptagonia, Ayioi Vavatsinias, and Vavatsinia.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR515] Fire in Cyprus
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR515/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):

The Arakapas village has been evacuated as well as the district boundaries into Larnaca, Melini, Ora, Odou, Sykopetra, and Eptagonia, Ayioi Vavatsinias, and Vavatsinia.

item.title: [EMSR514] Flood in Guyana
item.description:
Type of Event: Flood (Riverine flood);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-06-07 13:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-06-14 02:34:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Guyana;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

Heavy rainfall during the month of June flooded more than 28000 households in Guyana. The high water registered due to severe rainfalls either destroyed homes, leaving livestock and domestic animals in distress or farmlands inundated, resulting in crop loss and food insecurity.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR514] Flood in Guyana
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR514/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):

The high water registered due to severe rainfalls either destroyed homes, leaving livestock and domestic animals in distress or farmlands inundated, resulting in crop loss and food insecurity.

item.title: [EMSR513] Nyiragongo volcano's eruption, DR Congo and Rwanda
item.description:
Type of Event: Volcanic activity (Lava flow);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-05-22 19:00:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-05-23 23:27:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Congo (Kinshasa), Rwanda;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

Nyiragongo volcano (Democratic Republic of Congo) erupted on 22 May. The volcano last erupted in January 2002 killing 250 people and making 120,000 homeless. The lava is reaching the city of Goma (10 km from the volcano) and the government has launched an evacuation plan.



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR513] Nyiragongo volcano's eruption, DR Congo and Rwanda
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR513/aemfeed

Activation Location (preview):

item.iwgsem:activationDescription: Nyiragongo volcano (Democratic Republic of Congo) erupted on 22 May. The volcano last erupted in January 2002 killing 250 people and making 120,000 homeless. The lava is reaching the city of Goma (10 km from the volcano) and the government has launched an evacuation plan.

item.title: [EMSR512] Forest fire in Arico Tenerife, Spain
item.description:
Type of Event: Wildfire (Forest fire);
Date/Time of Event (UTC): 2021-05-20 09:45:00;
Activation Date/Time (UTC): 2021-05-21 11:58:00;
Dedicated Mechanism: Copernicus EMS (RM);
Affected Country: Spain;
Affected Area: ;
Event Description:

On 05/20/2021, a major forest fire started on the Island of Tenerife (Canary Islands). This fire mainly affects the municipality of Arico in the south-east of the island and affects the Corona Forestal Natural Park near the Teide National Park, where there is a significant number of endemisms. Due to the adverse weather conditions the fire can be active for several days and affect populated areas. Copernicus EMS Rapid Mapping is requested to provide First Estimate Product, Delineation and Grading products



Details, maps:
▸ [EMSR512] Forest fire in Arico Tenerife, Spain
Activation Feed (GeoRSS):
▸ https://emergency.copernicus.eu/mapping/list-of-components/EMSR512/aemfeed
